00024 #ifndef __SYS_FILE_H__
00025 #define __SYS_FILE_H__
00026 
00027 #include "sys/Conf.h"
00028 #include "sys/SystemException.h"
00029 
00030 #ifdef WIN32
00031 #    define _SYS_SEEK_CUR FILE_CURRENT
00032 #    define _SYS_SEEK_SET FILE_BEGIN
00033 #    define _SYS_SEEK_END FILE_END
00034 #    define _SYS_CREAT    OPEN_ALWAYS
00035 #    define _SYS_OPEN_EXISTING OPEN_EXISTING
00036 #    define _SYS_TRUNC TRUNCATE_EXISTING
00037 #    define _SYS_RDONLY GENERIC_READ
00038 #    define _SYS_WRONLY GENERIC_WRITE
00039 #    define _SYS_RDWR GENERIC_READ|GENERIC_WRITE
00040 #    define SYS_INVALID_HANDLE INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE
00041 typedef HANDLE _SYS_HANDLE_TYPE;
00042 #else
00043 #    define _SYS_DEFAULT_PERM 0644
00044 #    define _SYS_MAX_READ_ATTEMPTS 100
00045 #    define _SYS_SEEK_CUR SEEK_CUR
00046 #    define _SYS_SEEK_SET SEEK_SET
00047 #    define _SYS_SEEK_END SEEK_END
00048 #    define _SYS_CREAT O_CREAT
00049 #    define _SYS_OPEN_EXISTING 0
00050 #    define _SYS_TRUNC O_TRUNC
00051 #    define _SYS_RDONLY O_RDONLY
00052 #    define _SYS_WRONLY O_WRONLY
00053 #    define _SYS_RDWR O_RDWR
00054 #    define SYS_INVALID_HANDLE -1
00055 typedef int _SYS_HANDLE_TYPE;
00056 #endif
00057 
00069 namespace sys
00070 {
00071 class File
00072 {
00073 protected:
00074     _SYS_HANDLE_TYPE mHandle;
00075 public:
00076 
00077     enum { FROM_START = _SYS_SEEK_SET,
00078            FROM_CURRENT = _SYS_SEEK_CUR,
00079            FROM_END = _SYS_SEEK_END,
00080            CREATE = _SYS_CREAT,
00081            EXISTING = _SYS_OPEN_EXISTING,
00082            TRUNCATE = _SYS_TRUNC,
00083            READ_ONLY = _SYS_RDONLY,
00084            WRITE_ONLY = _SYS_WRONLY,
00085            READ_AND_WRITE = _SYS_RDWR };
00086 
00090     File() : mHandle(SYS_INVALID_HANDLE)
00091     {}
00092 
00097     File(const std::string& str) throw(sys::SystemException)
00098     {
00099         create(str, READ_ONLY, EXISTING);
00100     }
00101 
00108     File(const std::string& str,
00109          int accessFlags,
00110          int creationFlags) throw(sys::SystemException)
00111     {
00112         create(str, accessFlags, creationFlags);
00113     }
00114 
00118     ~File()
00119     {
00120         if (isOpen()) close();
00121     }
00122 
00127     bool isOpen()
00128     {
00129         return (mHandle != SYS_INVALID_HANDLE);
00130     }
00131 
00136     _SYS_HANDLE_TYPE getHandle() { return mHandle; }
00137 
00138 
00145     void create(const std::string& str,
00146                 int accessFlags,
00147                 int creationFlags) throw(sys::SystemException);
00148 
00149 
00160     void readInto(char* buffer, Size_T size)
00161     throw(sys::SystemException);
00162 
00173     void writeFrom(const char* buffer, Size_T size)
00174     throw(sys::SystemException);
00175 
00176 
00183     sys::Off_T seekTo(sys::Off_T offset, int whence)
00184     throw(sys::SystemException);
00185 
00190     sys::Off_T getCurrentOffset() throw(sys::SystemException)
00191     {
00192         return seekTo(0, sys::File::FROM_CURRENT);
00193     }
00194 
00199     sys::Off_T length() throw(sys::SystemException);
00200 
00204     void close();
00205 
00206 };
00207 
00208 }
